oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett to his mother, Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett (regarding poem)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett (1892-1951) served in Btry. F, 318th F.A. Regt., 81st Div. during World War I. The letter, written on YMCA letterhead, is addressed to his mother, Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett, in Huntingdon, Tennessee. Included in this letter is a war poem written by the soldier titled "My Mothers Prayer."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
